text: vēdaṁ nalkappeṭṭavaruṭe aṭukkal nī ellāvidha dr̥ṣṭāntavuṁ keāṇṭ cennāluṁ avar ninṟe khib laye pintuṭarunnatalla. avaruṭe khib laye nīyuṁ pintuṭarunnatalla. avaril oru vibhāgaṁ maṟṟeāru vibhāgattinṟekhib laye pintuṭarukayumilla. ninakk śariyāya aṟiv vannukiṭṭiya śēṣaṁ nīyeṅṅānuṁ avaruṭe icchakaḷe pinpaṟṟiyāl nīyuṁ atikramakārikaḷuṭe kūṭṭattil tanneyāyirikkuṁ
